newsitem.title: JAPAN: Danish gas firm launches 5.7% dual samurai bonds.
newsitem.headline: Danish gas firm launches 5.7% dual samurai bonds.

text.p: Denmark's Hovedstadsregionens Naturgas (Greater Copenhagen Natural Gas) on Tuesday launched 20 billion yen worth of 5.7 percent yen/Canadian dollar dual currency samurai bonds due in November 1999, lead manager Merrill Lynch said.
The bonds will be priced at par, with twice yearly coupon payments. The coupon will be paid in yen, while redemption will be in Canadian dollars.
Holders of the samurai bonds will receive 5,704.01 Canadian dollars for each 500,000 yen bond held at maturity.
